definitions: A brief and usually light fall of rain, hail, sleet, or snow.
A mass of small things falling or moving at the same time.
A large number of things happening or given at the same time.
A group of particles produced by a cosmic-ray particle in the earth's atmosphere.
A cubicle or bath in which a person stands under a spray of water to wash.
The apparatus in a shower that produces the spray of water.
An act of washing oneself in a shower.
A group of people perceived as incompetent or worthless.
A party at which presents are given to someone, typically a woman who is about to get married or have a baby.
